B.title: Short-Answer Questions
B.instructions: Attempt any TEN part questions in all. All questions carry equal marks. (i.e. 4 marks of each part).

questions.question: Solve the following complex equation: (x, y)(2, 3) = (-4, 7)
Using properties of determinants prove that: |b+c a a; b c+a b; c c a+b| = 4abc
Calculate the projection of b along a when a = i - 2j + 3k and b = 3i - j - 5k
Find Arithmetic, Geometric and Harmonic means between 1 and 9. Also verify that AH = G²
Find the sum of the series 3 + 6 + 21 + 96 + 471 + ... to n terms
How many words can be formed by 3 vowels and 4 consonants out of 5 vowels and 7 consonants? OR How many arrangements can be formed using all the letters of the word 'MATHEMATICS'?
Using the principle of mathematical induction for every positive integer n, prove that: 1/(1.2) + 1/(2.3) + 1/(3.4) + ... + 1/[n(n+1)] = n/(n+1)
Find the middle term in the expansion of (a/b - b/a)¹⁸ OR find the term independent of 'x' in (2x + 1/x²)⁹
Let f: R → R be the function defined by f(x) = √(x + 7), x ≥ -7, find the value of f⁻¹(x)
If A + B + C = 180° then prove that cos((B+C)/2) = sin(A/2)
Find the smallest angle in ΔABC when a = 25cm, b = 18cm and c = 21cm
Prove that 1/r₁² + 1/r₂² + 1/r₃² = (a² + b² + c²)/Δ²
Solve the equation cosθ - θ = 0 graphically for interval -π/2 ≤ θ ≤ π/2. OR Show that 2tan⁻¹(2/3) = cos⁻¹(5/13)
Find the point of intersection of the following functions graphically: f(x) = x + 4 and g(x) = x² - 6x + 10
